languages.text: If the Soldier {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy twice with one ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack, the second hit will deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the damage of the first hit.
languages.original_text: Если солдат, выстрелив {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g}, поразил цель дважды, второе {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} нанесет дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, равный урону от первого попадания.

traits.locale_text: If the Marksman hits an enemy twice with one burst attack, the second hit will deal additional damage equal to half of the damage of the first hit.
If the Marksman hits an enemy twice with one burst attack, the second hit will deal additional damage equal to the damage of the first hit.

If the Soldier {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy twice with one ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack, the second hit will deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the damage of the first hit.
If the Marksman hits an enemy twice with one {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst{/g} attacks, the second hit will deal additional damage equal to the damage of the first {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g}.

If the Soldier {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy twice with one ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack, the second hit will deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the damage of the first hit.

languages.text: Если солдат, выстрелив {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g}, поразил цель дважды, второе {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} нанесет дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, равный урону от первого попадания.
languages.original_text: If the Soldier {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy twice with one {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack, the second hit will deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the damage of the first hit.

traits.locale_text: Если стрелок, выстрелив очередью, поразил цель дважды, второе попадание нанесет дополнительный урон, равный урону от первого попадания.
Если стрелок, выстрелив очередью, поразил цель дважды, второе попадание нанесет дополнительный урон, равный урону от первого попадания.

languages.text: 如果士兵的{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}射击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人两次，则第二次射击命中时会造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，额外伤害值等同于第一次命中的伤害。
languages.original_text: If the Soldier {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy twice with one ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack, the second hit will deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the damage of the first hit.

traits.locale_text: 如果神射手某次{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}连发射击{/g}命中敌人两次，则第二次命中会造成额外伤害，额外伤害值等同于第一次{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}的伤害。

languages.text: Si el soldado {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} dos veces a un enemigo con un ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} a distancia, el segundo impacto infligirá tanto {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional como el daño del primer impacto.
languages.original_text: If the Soldier {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy twice with one ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack, the second hit will deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the damage of the first hit.

traits.locale_text: Si el tirador de élite golpea dos veces a un enemigo con un {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}ataque de ráfaga{/g}, el segundo impacto infligirá tanto daño adicional como el daño del primer {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der Soldat ein Ziel mit demselben {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salven{/g}angriff zweimal {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, verursacht der zweite Treffer zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} in Höhe des Schadens des ersten Treffers.
languages.original_text: If the Soldier {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy twice with one ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack, the second hit will deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the damage of the first hit.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Scharfschütze ein Ziel mit demselben {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Bündelangriff{/g} zweimal trifft, fügt der zweite Treffer zusätzlichen Schaden in Höhe des Schadens des ersten {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffers{/g} zu.

languages.text: Si le soldat {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un ennemi deux fois avec une attaque en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g} à distance, le deuxième coup inflige un montant de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires égal aux dégâts du premier coup.
languages.original_text: If the Soldier {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy twice with one ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack, the second hit will deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the damage of the first hit.

traits.locale_text: Si le Tireur d'Élite touche un ennemi deux fois lors d'une {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}attaque en rafale{/g}, le nombre de points de dégâts supplémentaires infligés lors du deuxième coup est égal au nombre de points du premier {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g}.

languages.text: 兵士が1回の遠距離{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}攻撃で敵1体に2回命中させた場合、2回目の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}時は初回命中時の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に等しい追加ダメージを与える。
languages.original_text: If the Soldier {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy twice with one ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack, the second hit will deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the damage of the first hit.

traits.locale_text: マークスマンが1回の{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}バーストアタック{/g}で敵1体に2回命中させた場合、2回目の命中時は初回{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}のダメージに等しい追加ダメージを与える。

languages.text: Asker, bir düşmanı menzilli bir {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırıyla{/g} iki kez {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurursa{/g} ikinci vuruş, ilk vuruşun hasarına eşit miktarda ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: If the Soldier {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy twice with one ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack, the second hit will deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the damage of the first hit.
